name: After Hours (itch) (Lucas Acosta-Morales)
description:
STORY

While taking a shortcut on his way home from trick-or-treating, young Max Cosway gets lost in the woods. Can he find a way out before the cold gets to him?

HINT: There are 8 Candycorns hidden in the game. Collecting them gives you a great reward: Personal Satisfaction!

CONTROLS

'Z' Key - Menu Selection

Up/Down Arrows - Menu Movement

Left/Right Arrows - Move Left/Right

Space Bar - Jump

Down Arrow - Crouch

Up Arrow - Climb Vines

'Z' Key - Use Balloon (If Unlocked)

CREDITS

This game was made in the span of one week for the Fall 2022 DeSales University ACM Chapter Game Jam. The theme for this Game Jam was "Winter Cold" and "Halloweeeny Orange." All music, story design, level design, and programming was completed by Lucas Acosta-Morales. Artwork and SFX used is Licensed through Creative Commons and edited by Lucas Acosta-Morales.
